description:
Are you an online instructor or coach?

What if you could engage and interact LIVE with your students or coaching clients, anywhere, any time?

Consider how much more value you can bring to your students as you answer their questions in real time!

Think about how your enrollments will grow as you build solid relationships with your students. Are you ready to take it to the next level?

Let's face it, getting students to engage and interact with your material and announcements can be frustrating if you don't have a strategy in place.

That's why I created this course! Because just like you I was searching for ways to connect with my students in a meaningful way.

I'll get you up and running on Periscope in a flash, then show you how to present unique and exciting content to your students.

Looking for ways to maximize interaction, no worries, you'll find tips and best practices clearly explained within the course.

Stop struggling with student engagement!

  • Learn 4 ways to bring engaging content to your students
  • Discover how to maximize your audience and viewer interaction
  • Find ways to use Periscope to generate sales

Plus, as a bonus, you'll also have access to recordings I made of some of my Periscope broadcasts, including

  • an interview with a personal trainer who uses Periscope to interact with her clients
  • a behind the scenes sports taping demonstration

Your purchase is totally protected by the Udemy 30 Day money back guarantee. You have absolutely nothing to lose.

  • Start building strong relationships with your students
  • Begin creating content that will have your students spellbound
  • Take your student engagement and interaction to the next level

Are you ready? Let's go!
title: Periscope for Online Instructors and Coaches
